temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.content: The optimal temperature for STEC growth is between 36째C and 40째C, but the bacteria can survive between 6째C to 45.5째C.

oxygen.title: Oxygen
oxygen.content: STEC can survive in aerobic and anaerobic environments.

ph.title: pH
ph.content: STEC can survive in a wide range of pH conditions between 4.4 to 9 and grow optimally at pH from 6 to 7.

humidity.title: Water
humidity.content: STEC can grow with water activity (a<sub>w</sub>) above 0.995.

salinity.title: Salinity
salinity.content: The optimal salinity for STEC is 0% but it can tolerate up to 8.5%.
